title: Radiant Zircon Stone Choker Set - A Modern Take on Traditional Splendor
materials: Crafted in high-quality alloy with a radiant rose gold and silver tone finish
meticulously studded with sparkling white Zircon stones. Our signature Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and prevents tarnishing.
features: This set showcases a unique fusion of modern design and traditional South Indian aesthetics. The choker features layered geometric patterns. The earrings are of Jhumka style with leaf and floral motifs, all intricately set with Zircon stones. The open design creates a lightweight feel while maintaining a luxurious appearance.
colors: and White - a harmonious blend of warm and cool tones that complements a variety of outfits.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. This set also works beautifully for modern formal events and upscale gatherings.
description: This choker set offers a stunning contemporary design while subtly nodding to traditional South Indian jewelry aesthetics. The meticulous Zircon setting ensures maximum sparkle, while the Hyderabadi polish guarantees long-lasting shine. An affordable luxury that enhances your style without compromising on quality.
